answers.answer: what is your bg on the days you dont feel good?

question: I have type 2 Diabetes I take oral Janumet. My question is even though i take meds and have my diabetes pretty much under control. I have bad days were I just dont feel good. Is that normal? My mother In-law thinks that im fine and that my diabetes is not a big deal. But think that me not feeling good has to do with my diabetes. I get stomach aches often.
title: Help Clear my mind
